Pushed Authorization¶

Introduction¶

https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-lodderstedt-oauth-par-00.html

The Internet draft defines the pushed authorization request endpoint, which allows clients to push the payload of an OAuth 2.0 authorization request to the authorization server via a direct request and provides them with a request URI that is used as reference to the data in a subsequent authorization request.
